channel.title: crypto on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in crypto on Barefoot Rob

item.title: cookin with CPU
item.description: 09:04 Tuesday 23 May 2017 JST I upgraded my Dogecoin wallet to the latest version, so my CPU is working to catch up all the transactions.

item.title: z.cash
item.description: 19:21 Monday 15 May 2017 JST Okay so my z.cash VM ran out of memory here on my local box, so I will probably spin one up in the cloud. AWS is easiest for me, but maybe I’ll take a bit more time to find a less expensive solution. Is Linode a flat rate? Hmmmm. Maybe it’s time to get my own one of those. 12:25 Tuesday 16 May 2017 JST Looks like I am targetting AWS, just because I can hopefully get Ansible to do all the grunt work.
